error.Must be a valid email address: Must be a valid email address

error.Password must be min 8 characters, and h: Password must be min 8 characters, and have 1 Special Character, 1 Uppercase, 1 Number and 1 Lowercase

error.Full name must be characters only: Full name must be characters only

error.Must contain only numeric digits and onl: Must contain only numeric digits and only 10 digits
error.Mobile number must be exactly 10 digits: Mobile number must be exactly 10 digits

isUserConsent.label1: I certify that I have the legal authority to create this account and engage on this site as Plan Administrator on behalf of the above stated business. I understand that creating this account, my first name and last name represent my electronic signature.
isUserConsent.label2: I accept these terms and the conditions of the community health plan as outlined in the accompanying document.

privacyDialogText.value1: By submitting this application form, I hereby affirm and declare that all information provided herein is complete, true, and accurate to the best of my knowledge and belief. I understand that this information is critical for the assessment and provision of health coverage under the community health plan, which is subject to the laws and regulations applicable within the designated service regions in Africa
privacyDialogText.value2: I acknowledge that this health coverage is contingent upon the truthfulness of the information supplied, and any misrepresentation, omission, or falsification of information may result in denial of coverage, withdrawal of coverage at any point, or other legal actions as permitted under the governing laws
privacyDialogText.value3: Example: If an applicant indicates 'No' to the question 'Is the beneficiary a smoker?'' but it is later discovered that the beneficiary has a history of smoking, particularly in the event of a cancer diagnosis linked to smoking habits, the community health plan may deny coverage for treatments related to such conditions.
privacyDialogText.value4: Furthermore, I consent to the community health plan conducting necessary verifications and investigations to validate the information provided. If any information is found to be incorrect or misleading after coverage has been granted, I understand that the coverage may be retroactively denied or canceled, and any claims made may be subject to denial or recovery of costs incurred by the community health plan.
privacyDialogText.value5: I grant full authorization to the community health plan administrators to request and obtain information pertinent to this application and the ongoing evaluation of the beneficiary's coverage eligibility. This may include, but is not limited to, medical records, prescription records, and other health-related information from any hospital, clinic, pharmacy, or other medical service provider.
privacyDialogText.value6: I commit to promptly inform the community health plan of any changes in the beneficiary's health status or other relevant information that could impact coverage under the community health plan.
privacyDialogText.value7: The undersigned acknowledges that they are completing this form on behalf of the named beneficiary who resides in Africa and that they have the authority to provide this information and consent to its use for the purposes of health coverage.
privacyDialogText.value8: I accept these terms and the conditions of the community health plan as outlined in the accompanying document.
privacyDialogText.heading: Declaration and Consent

error.You must agree to the terms and privacy: You must agree to the terms and privacy policy to continue.

Enter necessary details to create your a: Enter necessary details to create your account.
